thread.title: Follow Gandalf's Journey in These Stunning New Lord of the Rings Posters
thread.title_full: Follow Gandalf's Journey in These Stunning New Lord of the Rings Posters

author: Germain Lussier
title: Follow Gandalf's Journey in These Stunning New Lord of the Rings Posters
text:
Go to permalink 
One of the many reasons why The Lord of the Rings trilogy, in both book and movie form, is so good is the characters. Each hero, villain, and everything in between is simply memorable and captivating. Everyone has their favorites and if your favorite is Gandalf, this is going to knock your socks off. Advertisement 
Below you see three posters by Matt Ferguson, currently on sale from Bottleneck Gallery. Each is a 12 x 24-inch screenprint and they’re available until Sunday, January 15 at 11:59 pm EST. 
Here’s each one in more detail. They’re called Bag End , Zirakzigil , and Minas Tirith. 
The prints cost $35 each or $100 for the set and are available on bottleneckgallery.com . Advertisement 
Also, this pin is on sale with 100 percent of the profits going to the Myfanwy Townsend Melanoma Research Fund in memory of one of Bottleneck’s friends, Alexandra Grace. It’s $10. 
This is all at BottleneckGallery.com .
